text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"County commissioners" means the Board of County Commissioners of St. Mary's County.

section.section: "Gaming device" includes a paddle wheel, wheel of fortune, chance book, bingo, Nevada card, and a stamp machine.
"Gaming device" does not include a slot machine, as defined in § 12-301 of this article.

text.section: "Gaming event" means a carnival, bazaar, or raffle.
"Sheriff" means the Sheriff of St. Mary's County.
